Now in Beta

PicoClaw

An AI assistant that respects your hardware

Ultra-lightweight AI assistant written in Go. Less than 10MB RAM, under 50ms cold start, local LLM inference. Every bit helps, every bit matters.

Get StartedView on GitHub
<10MB
RAM Usage
<50ms
Cold Start
100%
Open Source

Why PicoClaw?

Built for developers who value performance, privacy, and simplicity.

Terminal Native

Works seamlessly in your terminal. No GUI bloat, just pure CLI efficiency.

Tiny Footprint

Uses less than 10MB RAM. Runs on $10 boards like LicheeRV Nano.

Lightning Fast

Sub-50ms cold start. No waiting, instant responses every time.

Privacy First

Local LLM inference. Your data never leaves your machine.

Developer Friendly

Plugin system written in Go. Easy to extend and customize.

Multi-Channel

Works via Telegram, WhatsApp, Feishu, and more.

See It In Action

Just type and go. No bloated interfaces, just a clean terminal experience.

Terminal

Install

# macOS / Linux
curl -fsSL https://picoclaw.dev/install.sh | sh

# Or build from source
go install github.com/sipeed/picoclaw@latest

Configure

{
  "llm": {
    "provider": "ollama",
    "model": "llama3.2:1b"
  },
  "channels": ["terminal", "telegram"],
  "plugins": ["weather", "reminder", "search"]
}
